article_title: Cary police searching for man wanted in bank robbery
article_text:
You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters

Message: * A friend wanted you to see this item from WRAL.com: http://wral.com/15202424

— Cary police were searching Tuesday afternoon for a man they say robbed a Wells Fargo branch on Harrison Avenue.

Authorities say a man wearing a black jacket and sunglasses went into the bank, at 1701 N. Harrison Ave., at about 11:45 a.m. and demanded money.

The man told bank employees he had a weapon, but he never showed it, police said.

The man left the area on foot with an unknown amount of money.

No other information about the robbery has been released.
